info.name: Tumblr - Glee icon set
info.description: Replace your dashboard icons with some of Glee's best-known images: the loser sign, a Lima Bean mug, a slushie cup, a music symbol, and Rachel's star!
info.additionalInfo: Contact me on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions/problems/requests. The logo in the second screenshot is also my own work, and can be found here - [x] Edited 12/09/14: Updated to work with the new Tumblr update. Please note that the slushie cup will only appear if you have XKit enabled.
